DOC.brief_summary: Hyperbilirubinemia report positive predictor diagnose perforate appendicitis . Therefore analyse diagnostic accuracy serum bilirubin discriminate perforate simple/no appendicitis . Methods : All consecutive patient undergo appendectomy suspect appendicitis May 2009 August 2011 analyse . Primary endpoint diagnostic accuracy serum bilirubin level detect perforate appendicitis .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Accuracy Serum Bilirubin Prediction Perforated Appendicitis
DOC.criteria: patient undergo appendectomy suspect appendicitis preexist liver disease
